attributes.name: Ensure that the --bind-address argument is set to 127.0.0.1 (Automated)
attributes.description: Do not bind the scheduler service to non-loopback insecure addresses.
attributes.rationale: The Scheduler API service which runs on port 10251/TCP by default is used for health and metrics information and is available without authentication or encryption. As such it should only be bound to a localhost interface, to minimize the cluster's attack surface
attributes.audit:
Run the following command on the control plane node:
```
ps -ef | grep kube-scheduler
```
Verify that the `--bind-address` argument is set to 127.0.0.1
attributes.remediation:
Edit the Scheduler pod specification file
`/etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-scheduler.yaml` 
on the control plane node and ensure the correct value for the `--bind-address`
parameter
attributes.default_value: By default, the `--bind-address` parameter is set to 0.0.0.0
